white mercury

white - referring to a high wheat content malt bill fermented by Belgian yeast
mercury - most proximal rock with respect to the sun; fleet footed messenger of good times; refers to the potential toxicity of the beverage

about

c in physics refers to the speed of light, or 299,792,458 meters per second, the universal speed limit. The letter c was connected to the latin word celeritas, or swiftness, by the great science fiction author Isaac Asimov in 1959. In the minds of physicists and science fiction authors, the speed of light represents something sacred. In physics, it is an unattainable dream for humans to travel at this speed, that according to Einstein would cause time itself to warp around us. In fiction, travelling at this speed has provided a gateway to the far reaches of the universe, and a connection to other intelligences. At Celeritas Brewing, our love for these concepts drives us in our exploration of the world of beer. We want to pursue unattainable dreams, and explore and connect to other cultures through our homebrewing adventures.

Celeritas Brewing was established in Austin, TX in 2013. a hop head (Katie) and a farmhouse funkmaster (Derek) came together to create backyard brews. Coincidentally, they also happened to be married.

the process

We hope to expand our production in the coming year. Come on over and enjoy some nerd-themed brews!
